main: ^I have a favour to ask you. I need you to get me a blueprint from the science quadrant.
^When you find it, come back to me.

nextvisit: ^No luck finding a blueprint? thats a shame.

b: ^You know I might be able make some improvements to your chasis if with one of those blueprints.
^I'm sure some extra firepower must sound entising
